content: lion brand pattern # 70676ad skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 4 colors 3 balls each 12 balls total *florida keys green windsor russet cream* crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm pattern 1-row repeat in double_crochet special stitch dc3tog double_crochet 3 stitches together work 2 row in each color until afghan measures about 60 in 152 5 cm from beginning fasten_off and weave in ends to finish see domestic bliss / ripple effect / forest reflections afghan 1 for the 3-color version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/domestic-bliss---ripple-effect---forest-reflections-afghan
